Comment: add to existing plate on ender to double thickness and improve stiffness.

Component: 1200 watt flex shaft grinder with hand piece
second Z axis screw  for ender 3
X axis linear rail upgrade for ender 3
Y axis linear rail upgrade ender 3
1/2" arbor hole 0.02" wide HSS slitting saw blade
Comment: can be purchased for ~6 USD / piece from malco directly. typically lasts ~100 hours printing in aluminum.

Component: you will need to print a wire spool holder and some way to hang or otherwise support the grinder motor.

You may also want to enclose the printer, as it tends to be quite noisy, like a table saw. it also produces some swarf and debris as in grinding or sawing. if you use this printer unenclosed you do so at your own risk and should wear adequate hearing and eye/face/body protection while it is in operation.
SK 25 spindle holder for flex shafthandpiece
Rotoforge 6mm shaft X 1/2" arbor for saw blades
Rotoforge wire guide arm bracket for supporting wire guide
